3: The path is clear now!
Get inside!
Once you all make it into the stairwell, Watanabe secures the airlock.
This should keep them busy for a while.
Let's go. The elevator might not work, but surely the stairs will be fine.
Commandant, d'you think we'll find the 'King' down there?

4: It doesn't seem that simple to me.

3: No matter who it is, I kinda feel bad for him. I hope we can get him out of there...
Right? Nanami thinks so too!
Here we are... This is the door.
The heart of the fortress should be on the other side of the door.

2: Is the CPF really all the way down here?

3: In a doomsday fortress, you don't need to worry about the virus outside. The CPF would therefore be somewhere inside.
All right, I'm not sure if it's safe on the other side of the door. You all should back up...
Watanabe twists the heavy handle with force. A whoosh of air rushes through the airlock gap.
As the airlock door slowly opens in front of you, you are greeted by a blinding flash, followed quickly by the sound of explosions.
Down!
You all drop to the ground, trying to evade whatever weapons that will come flying at you.
The crackle of weapons fire never comes.
...Up you get. Looks like it was a bluff.
You all stand up slowly to see spent firecrackers , and... a graffitied wall.
'All ye who tread upon the domain of the King... This is your punishment!'
What a childish thing to say...
Nanami doesn't think the King is so good anymore!
